### *Fique à vontade para montar a página de apresentação* 

Markdown is an authoring format that enables easy creation of dynamic documents, presentations, and reports from R. It combines the core syntax of [markdown](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/) (an easy to write plain text format) with embedded R code chunks that are run so their output can be included in the final document. 

### Seção 2 
R Markdown documents are fully reproducible (they can be automatically regenerated whenever underlying R code or data changes).
